channel.title: Tragedy pk help
channel.description:
can somebody help me and tell me what ip's i need to change so people can get on?
[edit] sorry posted before thinking this is client sided, if a mod could move pleas:)

item.title: Tragedy pk help
item.dc:creator: @deans1243 deans1243
item.description:
@deans1243 wrote:

ok i fixed it thank you:)

Read full topic

item.title: Tragedy pk help
item.dc:creator: @deans1243 deans1243
item.description:
@deans1243 wrote:

ok so i looked in all these files
server side(client.java, server.java, connection.java)
client side(client.java, gui.java)
i searched 5555 in all and changed the ones that showed up.
one problem, idk were what other file to look it. it still sais server listining on port 0.0.0.0:5555 can you pleas tell me were to change that, i found the file that said server listining on port 0.0.0.0 but were do i change this + serverlistenerPort
i think werever that is is the last port i need to change. so pleas help:)

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @_Haste1 #Haste
item.description:
@_Haste1 wrote:

deans1243:

lol yea thats the problem im not on 5555. ill change it then post again and tell you how it turns out:)

Ok, reply back

item.title: Tragedy pk help
item.dc:creator: @_Haste1 #Haste
item.description:
@_Haste1 wrote:

Also change the port (Find it, don’t ask)

From 5555 to the port you’re using. Must be 43594?

Read full topic

item.title: Tragedy pk help
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[quote="#Haste, post:6, topic:365901"][quote author=deans1243 link=topic=462097.msg3380443#msg3380443 date=1287972218]
it came with local host ip on it but i changed all of the ip’s to my np-ip and the one in gui and i still cant get on not even on the computer im hosting it on.
[/quote]

You cannot run your server with your no-ip as the client’s IP.

Use 127.0.0.1 (Replace them all, again) when you release your server… Change to no-ip and extract to .rar once it’s fully extracted into .rar file

Change all the no-ip IP’s back to 127.0.0.1

/end[/quote]
Yes you can, the client does not listen on any port or anything.
I don’t even know what you’re talking about anymore.

Read full topic

item.title: Tragedy pk help
item.dc:creator: @_Haste1 #Haste
item.description:
@_Haste1 wrote:

deans1243:

it came with local host ip on it but i changed all of the ip’s to my np-ip and the one in gui and i still cant get on not even on the computer im hosting it on.

You cannot run your server with your no-ip as the client’s IP.

Use 127.0.0.1 (Replace them all, again) when you release your server… Change to no-ip and extract to .rar once it’s fully extracted into .rar file

Change all the no-ip IP’s back to 127.0.0.1

/end

Read full topic

item.title: Tragedy pk help
item.dc:creator: @_Haste1 #Haste
item.description:
@_Haste1 wrote:

You use 127.0.0.1 to get onto the client, because you cannot connect your no-ip if you have that linked to your client. So you use 127.0.0.1

But when you release the server, you use your no-ip, and once you upload to .rar you change back to 127.0.0.1

Read full topic

item.title: Tragedy pk help
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[quote="#Haste, post:2, topic:365901"][quote author=deans1243 link=topic=462097.msg3380408#msg3380408 date=1287970379]
can somebody help me and tell me what ip’s i need to change so people can get on?

[edit] sorry posted before thinking this is client sided, if a mod could move pleas:)
[/quote]

Gui.Java and client.Java - Search for no-ip and replace it with 127.0.0.1

There’s like 3-6 change them all, build the client and run[/quote]
Why would you change it to localhost if you want other players to get on your server using the client?

Read full topic
